page.title: 03THE MOBILE LIBRARY VAN
page.content: A{Mobile Library Van}travels around the{Saffron Walden}area four times a week, on Mondays,Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays.It is serviced every eighth Friday.The Library Van weighs 7.25 tons including the books.It is 8ft wide and 28ft long and has six wheels.It is designed so that the driver does not need a Heavy Goods Vehicle licence. It serves 905 families altogether and there are approximately{1976}books on the van at any one time with another{3730}out on loan.The Library Van provides a very personal service as the librarian knows most of her customers and keeps books that she thinks will interest them.This is a particularly helpful service for old people living in the outlying areas.
